metadata.title: CVE-2022-1736 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Turning off RDP Remote Desktop Sharing with gnome-control-center wouldonly turn off RDP sharing for the current session. Upon logging back in,RDP Sharing would be enabled again without any additional user interactionor notification.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1736` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-control-center - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2
gnome-control-center-data - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2
gnome-control-center-faces - 1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnome-control-center package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:41.4-1ubuntu13.2').
